text.section:
Notwithstanding § 8-102 of this subtitle, an individual qualifies for jury service for a county only if the individual:
Is an adult as of the day selected as a prospective juror;
Is a citizen of the United States; and
Resides in the county as of the day sworn as a juror.
An individual qualifies for jury service notwithstanding a disqualifying conviction under subsection (b)(4) of this section if the individual is pardoned.
